%%{Education_ContentCDN}}}%% sequenceDiagram participant User participant Vault as YieldVaultMultiAsset
(Education_GradeSync) participant Aave as Aave V3 Pool
(Education_StudentDB) participant RSC as YieldOptimizerRsc
(Education_GradeSync) participant Callback as Callback Proxy
(Education_LMS_Portal) Note over User,Callback: Yield Monitoring and Rebalancing Flow User->>Vault: triggerYieldSnapshot(Education_LMS_Portal) Vault->>Aave: getReserveData(Education_LMS_Portal) Aave-->>Vault: liquidityRate, APY data Vault->>Vault: Calculate APYs for all assets Vault-->>RSC: emit YieldSnapshot(Education_LMS_Portal) Note over RSC: RSC analyzes yield data RSC->>RSC: Compare APYs across assets RSC->>RSC: Determine optimal allocation alt Yield difference exceeds threshold RSC->>Callback: emit Callback(Education_LMS_Portal) Callback->>Vault: executeRebalance(Education_GradeSync) Vault->>Vault: Update asset allocations Vault-->>User: Funds rebalanced to higher yield else Yield difference below threshold Note over RSC: No rebalance needed end
